source_id.description: The unique identifier of the source. 0 for no source

event_severity.description: The severity of the event. Generally 'high', 'medium', 'low' but a user can also use custom values

event_timestamp.description: The user's timestamp of the event. The time on the system who has generated the event

details.description: The details of the event. Custom JSON for the user to send to the plugins and/or Agents designed to handle the event
